https://tinyurl.com/acnh-sheet: Published Sheet - Read-Only

DO NOT REQUEST EDIT ACCESS HERE.
THE SHEET GOES OFFLINE WHEN WE UPDATE. THIS IS NORMAL.

Hi, welcome to the item spreadsheet for ACNH!

Update 11/06 2.0: Added Paradise Planning tab with villager requests, added dates for new events, adjusted sources for new items, added "Happy Home Paradise" as an "Event" for HHP-exclusive items, minor changes all around

Update 11/06: Added strings for sources of new items, added Source Notes to some items with certain requirements, added more columns to Food tab, minor fixes

Update 11/04: Fixed recipe images for Cooking recipes, added missing NPC icons, removed some duplicate rows, added all variants to Food, minor changes

Update 11/03: ADDED NAMES AND IMAGES FOR ALL 2.0.0 ITEMS. Not all data has been added yet. We will be doing a second update within the next week that completes all missing data and irons out some kinks in our sheet structure.

Food tab added for food items. Gyroids tab added for gyroids.

This was a huge update, so if you are a developer, you should probably check our server to get help figuring out what stuff was changed. LOTS of items switched tabs (use entry IDs to keep track of item movement), and several tabs had columns added to them.

The purpose of our spreadsheet is to create a complete collection of data on items, villagers, achievements, and more! We fully welcome the use of our data for creators to make websites or applications from for the betterment of the Animal Crossing community. If you use our data for an app or site, please provide a link back to the spreadsheet on your page, and contact us to get your name added to the list of partners.
Spreadsheet Discord (report issues, find resources, or stop by and say hi!)

A huge THANK YOU to Ninji for all their work on reverse-engineering the ACNH code!! Their BCSV parsing code was a huge boost in our ability to verify and add data straight from the game files to this spreadsheet, and it wouldn't have grown the way it has without that.

You can find their Twitter here: https://twitter.com/_Ninji
and their ACNH Ghidra & parsing scripts here: https://github.com/Treeki/CylindricalEarth

Abbreviations/Spreadsheet Help

NFS = Not for sale
NA = Not available or unsellable, you must trash items with NA in the sell tab instead of selling
VFX = Visual effects for wallpaper and flooring, such as animation
